w3af-run.w3af-version: w3af - Web Application Attack and Audit Framework Version: 1.7.6 Revision: unknown Distribution: Kali Linux Rolling Branch: unknown Local changes: No Author: Andres Riancho and the w3af team.

vulnerability.name: Auto-completable form
vulnerability.description: The URL: "http://edu.21cnmc.com/" has a "<form>" element with auto-complete enabled.
vulnerability.long-description:
In typical form-based web applications, it is common practice for developers to allow `autocomplete` within the HTML form to improve the usability of the page. With `autocomplete` enabled (default), the browser is allowed to cache previously entered form values.
For legitimate purposes, this allows the user to quickly re-enter the same data when completing the form multiple times.
When `autocomplete` is enabled on either/both the username and password fields, this could allow a cyber-criminal with access to the victim's computer the ability to have the victim's credentials automatically entered as the cyber-criminal visits the affected page.
The tool has discovered that the affected page contains a form containing a password field that has not disabled `autocomplete`.
vulnerability.fix-guidance:
The `autocomplete` value can be configured in two different locations. The first and most secure location is to disable the `autocomplete` attribute on the `<form>` HTML tag. This will disable `autocomplete` for all inputs within that form. An example of disabling `autocomplete` within the form tag is `<form autocomplete=off>`.
The second slightly less desirable option is to disable the `autocomplete` attribute for a specific `<input>` HTML tag. While this may be the less desired solution from a security perspective, it may be preferred method for usability reasons, depending on size of the form. An example of disabling the `autocomplete` attribute within a password input tag is `<input type=password autocomplete=off>`.

    陶纯孝同志
  • 赵沨与赵沨艺术教育思想
    王次炤院长
  • 关于网络音乐大学
    “优秀艺术教育学术成果发布平台”
          “权威艺术课程教学示范平台”
          “教授、指导教师与学员交互教学平台”
          “学员作品发布展示平台”                        更多
  • 音乐教育的普及,终身,多样化建设
    促进全国音乐教育的普及化(特别关注边远地区),
    终身化(具有高度灵活性,不受地域,时间,年龄限制),多
    样化(面向社会音乐文化领域中多层次人才的知识需求),
    个性化(创造精神与实际能力的提倡与培养)建设.    §
  • 关于网络教育的崭新教育形式
    网络教育包括先进的数字化音频,视频技术,实现文字,图像和声音的同步传输,方便有效地实现交互式教学.有些人将其归类于现代远程教育,称为继第一代函授教学,第二代卫星电视广播教学的第三代远程教育形式.    §
  • 优秀教授学者撰写教材并授课
    有相当数量的教授学者为中国二十一世纪网络音乐
    大学专门撰写教材并亲自授课,已开通/筹备中课程主讲
    教授包括：沈湘,陈宗群,赵方幸,吴锡麟,杨儒怀,杜鸣心,
    严良堃,严宝瑜,修海林,王好亮,姚恒璐,周铭孙等.    §
  • 课程阐述简要,语言逻辑清晰
    音乐学习的基本要求是研修曲谱,聆听音响,强化理
    论,熟知背景,高质量的电子课件正在陆续制作.示范标准,操作性强,学风清廉,避免背诵式八股,杜绝拟造新名词;结构合理,章节等级分明,不讲重复性课程。    §

欢迎您来到中国二十一世纪网络音乐大学,请输入您的用户名与密码登录.学习音乐课程.浏览教授课件.查找学习资料。

用户名：
密码：

忘记密码？

院校使用协议及附录下载

21CNMC最新消息|

21CNMC.COM是特别为中国院校/音乐机构及音乐爱好者建立的在线音乐学习平台.我们为院校及学员提供值得信赖的开放式网络音乐教育,并为其提供学术交流活动和艺术教育服务.

希望获得院校试用卡邀请？如果您愿意,请留下您的院校基本信息与电子邮件地址,我们将给您提供一个试用期为15天的院校测试帐号,并通过电子邮件将帐号信息发送给您.它是完全免费的.

vulnerability.name: Click-Jacking vulnerability
vulnerability.description: The whole target has no protection (X-Frame-Options header) against Click-Jacking attacks
vulnerability.long-description:
Clickjacking (User Interface redress attack, UI redress attack, UI redressing) is a malicious technique of tricking a Web user into clicking on something different from what the user perceives they are clicking on, thus potentially revealing confidential information or taking control of their computer while clicking on seemingly innocuous web pages.
The server didn't return an `X-Frame-Options` header which means that this website could be at risk of a clickjacking attack. The `X-Frame-Options` HTTP response header can be used to indicate whether or not a browser should be allowed to render a page inside a frame or iframe. Sites can use this to avoid clickjacking attacks, by ensuring that their content is not embedded into other sites.
vulnerability.fix-guidance: Configure your web server to include an X-Frame-Options header.

欢迎您来到中国二十一世纪网络音乐大学,请输入您的用户名与密码登录.学习音乐课程.浏览教授课件.查找学习资料。

密码：

院校使用协议及附录下载

21CNMC最新消息|

21CNMC.COM是特别为中国院校/音乐机构及音乐爱好者建立的在线音乐学习平台.我们为院校及学员提供值得信赖的开放式网络音乐教育,并为其提供学术交流活动和艺术教育服务.

希望获得院校试用卡邀请？如果您愿意,请留下您的院校基本信息与电子邮件地址,我们将给您提供一个试用期为15天的院校测试帐号,并通过电子邮件将帐号信息发送给您.它是完全免费的.
